items.title: Cases
items.description: - Added functionality to automatically close a case after a specified period of time.  This can be configured in the Settings page under the Case Settings section.  This defaults to Off.

items.title: Detections
items.description:
- Detection rules that have been imported from a Sigma Rule and subsequently synchronized to a tenant via a repository will now have the original sigma rule synchronized.
- The original sigma rule used to create a detection is now on a Sigma Rule tab on the Detection Details page.
- The Detections page now supports inverse filtering on the `tags`, `status` and `warnings` fields by using Alt+Click on the filter.

items.title: Event Queue
items.description: - Fixed an issue where Event Rules were not included in the Bulk Select action on the Event Queue page which could result in acting on unintended target events.

items.title: Detections
items.description:
- After a rule was removed from a repository, any organizations that had the same rule synchronized from said repository could not delete the rule.
- Detections should not get automatically flagged for assessment when adding a new exception or removing an existing exception.  It is a known bug that editing a Detection Exception that already exists still does not flag the rule for assessment automatically.
